definition: relating to or located in the region of the neck or throat, a vital part that is vulnerable to attack
details:
adjective
- relating to or located in the region of the neck or throat
= example: relating to or located in the region of the neck or throat
noun
- a vital part that is vulnerable to attack
= example: a vital part that is vulnerable to attack
- veins in the neck that return blood from the head
= synonyms: jugular vein
